title: Opinion: Why I’m skipping Dry January
description: “As a public health scientist, I have learned that firm prescriptions rarely capture life’s complexity,” Robert M. Kaplan writes.
content: “As a public health scientist, I have learned that firm prescriptions rarely capture life’s complexity,” Robert M. Kaplan writes.
